name: Emoji Drop
description:
Description:

Can you survive the onslaught of messages you're receiving?! Fall off the bounds of the screen and this conversation is over! Make sure to avoid explosive messages! 

Controls:

  • z-key - dash 
  • a / left-arrow - move left
  • d / right-arrow - move right
  • space - jump (hold to jump higher)

When the player turns blue this indicates your dash is on cooldown.
